3:
Sing to him a new song;
\q play skillfully and sing with joy.
4:
For Yahweh's word is upright,
\q and everything he does is fair.
\q
5:
He loves righteousness and justice.
\q The earth is full of Yahweh's covenant faithfulness.
\q
6:
By the word of Yahweh the heavens were made,
\q and all the stars were made by the breath of his mouth.
9:
For he spoke, and it was done;
\q he commanded, and it stood in place.
11:
The plans of Yahweh stand forever,
\q the plans of his heart for all generations.
\q
12:
Blessed is the nation whose God is Yahweh,
\q the people whom he has chosen as his own inheritance.
14:
From the place where he lives,
\q he looks down on all who live on the earth.
\q
15:
He who shapes the hearts of them all
\q observes all their deeds.
17:
A horse is false security for victory;
\q in spite of his great strength, he cannot rescue.
18:
See, Yahweh's eye is on those who fear him,
\q on those who count on his covenant faithfulness
\q
19:
to deliver their lives from death
\q and to keep them alive in times of famine.
21:
Our hearts rejoice in him,
\q for we trust in his holy name.
22:
Let your covenant faithfulness, Yahweh, be with us
\q as we put our hope in you.
